name: Wilson Filho
about_description: Developer with over 5 years of experience, starting my professional journey in 2018. Specialized in full stack web development, with solid experience in mobile Android development. Recognized for quick thinking and creativity in problem-solving. Enthusiast of web scraping with Python and other languages. Active contributor to the Node.js open source community, with 4 libraries published on NPM. Author of technical articles on programming on Medium, regular participant in hackathons and programming competitions.
